body: We just bought our first #home! It’s a fixer-upper, but we’re ready for the challenge. Can’t wait to start turning this place into our #dreamhome! #newhome #homerenovation

comments.body: Congrats! Fixer-uppers are a lot of work, but it’s so rewarding when you start seeing the transformation. What’s the first project you’re tackling?
@45454 Thanks! We’re starting with the kitchen—figured it’s the heart of the home, so we want to get that right first!
Congratulations! That’s so exciting. Are you planning to do most of the work yourselves or hire pros for the big stuff?
@56565 A mix of both! We’ll DIY the smaller things like painting and decor, but we’re bringing in pros for the plumbing and electrical work.
That’s amazing! There’s something special about making a house truly yours. Are you planning any big changes, like knocking down walls?
@67676 Yup, we’re actually knocking down a wall between the kitchen and living room to open up the space. It’s going to make such a difference!
Congrats on the new home! Do you have any design themes in mind? Modern, rustic, or something else?
@78787 We’re thinking of going for a modern rustic vibe—clean lines but with lots of warm, natural materials like wood and stone.
So happy for you! I’m sure it’ll be a lot of work, but the satisfaction of seeing it all come together will be worth it. Any outdoor projects planned too?
@89898 Thanks! Definitely—once the inside is sorted, we want to spruce up the backyard and maybe add a small garden. It’s a work in progress!
